pageContext.claim: “The fake news is comprised of -- it's a lot. It's a big chunk, OK? Somebody said, 'What's the chunk?' I said, '80 percent.' It's a lot. It's a lot.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tends to call "fake news" any media reports that he does not like.  It is simply false that 80 percent of the news reporting is invented or fraudulent.
